title: Disconnected internet
body:
Since Jan,
My Internet service is not stable.
I know this is my fault.
I'll fix the problem soon.
Could you please release my restrictions?
I need to wait for 10 min to play a game.

replies.body: We aren't able to alter [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties or game stats, but it's good to hear that the problem is being worked on.  The only way to remove the lower priority queues is to continue playing consistently without leaving games.  Let me know if you have any questions!
